content:
# I've successfully gathered 3 stones along with the 10 coal I already had. Now I can craft a Stone Furnace since I have all the required materials.

# Next, I'll craft the Stone Furnace and then place it in a suitable location for smelting.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft the Stone Furnace
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting the furnace

# After crafting, I will place the Stone Furnace in a nearby location. 
# I will first find a valid position to place it and then proceed with the placement.
furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Find a valid position to place the furnace
place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the Stone Furnace
print(f"Entities after placing furnace: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities after placing the furnace
